answerText: population inversion[10] The creation of population inversion is pivotal in the operation of these devices. Reliant on stimulated emission, these devices produce intense light and consist of a gain material placed in a cavity with two mirrors.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Virginia + Dartmouth | 9 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: In devices with three energy levels, this state is created through a process known as pumping, which involves raising atoms to a third energy state before they fall to the lower excited state. For 10 points each: [10] Name this state in which more elements of a physical system exist in an excited state than in the ground state. It cannot happen in a system with only two energy levels.
